description: Server-side JavaScript code implementing an Express.js web server for database visualization and management. It loads environment variables, supports multiple database types (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB), defines adapter classes for each, and sets up API endpoints for testing connections, retrieving tables, and fetching data.

classes.name: DatabaseAdapter
classes.description: Base class defining the interface for database adapters, including methods for testing connection, fetching tables, and data.

classes.name: SQLAdapter
classes.description: Abstract class extending DatabaseAdapter with SQL-specific methods for executing queries.

classes.name: PostgresAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for PostgreSQL database using 'pg' Pool for queries.

classes.name: MongoDBAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for MongoDB databases via 'mongodb' driver.

methods.name: loadEnvFiles
methods.description: Loads environment variables from env files for different databases.

methods.name: testConnections
methods.description: Attempts to connect to configured databases and reports success or failure.

methods.name: handleApiRequest
methods.description: Handles generic API requests for database operations, with validation.
